spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Remallia is a 13th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Remallia has a {@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Silver Raven||figurine of wondrous power (silver raven)}.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Remallia has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Arcane Ward
entries: Remallia has a magical ward that has 30 hit points. Whenever she takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, Remallia takes any remaining damage. When Remallia casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell. This applies to any of the following spells she casts: {@spell alarm}, {@spell mage armor}, {@spell shield}, {@spell arcane lock}, {@spell counterspell}, {@spell dispel magic}, {@spell banishment}, {@spell stoneskin}, {@spell globe of invulnerability} and {@spell symbol}.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.
